nodes.text: Syvris was a moon in Hutt Space. It was a favorite haunt of spice smugglers. Many of the moon's residents were smugglers, who lived and worked at a shadowport located in its largest crater.
A battle occurred in orbit of Syvris during the Cold War.
Syvris was located on the border between Hutt Space and Imperial-controlled space. It was subjugated by Imperial forces shortly before the Battle of Hoth.
